Training continued apace.%K%P
Shuri had gotten more used to her partner's\nmovements, which meant Kagura was free to dance\nto her heart's content.%K%P

'Aww yeah! Let's kick it up a notch!'%K%P
'K-Kagura, slow down a little.'%K%P
'What's wrong?\nDon't tell me you can't keep up with me?'%K%P

Shuri just couldn't back down from a challenge. \nShe followed Kagura's dance moves, throwing\nher whole body into it.%K%P
Or at least she tried to. Her movements always ended\nup becoming smaller and less projected. I guess Shuri\nstill wasn't used to dancing in a revealing outfit.%K%P
When she twirled around she was very obviously\nholding back so she didn't show her behind to\nthe camera.%K%P
'Let's take a five minute break!'%K%P
Shuri walked away to get her clothes back in order.%K%P
'Looks like she's still too self-conscious\nabout her outfit, huh?'%K%P
'You could tell?'%K%P
'Of course. She is my partner, after all.'%K%P
We'd thought Shuri would loosen up\ngiven time, but it was starting to look\nlike she'd need a little help.%K%P
'It's not that different from a swimsuit, right?'%K%P
'Actually, material-wise it's a bit different. \nIf we're making comparisons it's probably\nmore like underwear.'%K%P
'What? Now I'm even more impressed\nyou're so comfortable in that outfit.'%K%P
'It's only like underwear.\nIt's not the real thing, so it's fine.'%K%P

'Does that mean you're...'%K%P
'Uh-huh. Wanna see?'%K%P

Without waiting for a reply,\nKagura moved aside the skirt part of her costume.%K%P

'Whoa, whoa! What are you doing?!'%K%P
'Don't act so shocked. \nThese are a legitimate part of my outfit.'%K%P
Outfit or not, to me they just looked like a garment\ndesigned only to cover the bare essentials.%K%P
'We talked about this, remember?\nThey're the type people are meant to see.'%K%P
'R-right...\nHow are they different from normal panties, exactly?'%K%P
'For one thing they're smaller,\nso it's harder to catch a glimpse of them.'%K%P
'Don't you ever feel...embarrassed?'%K%P
'It's all about perspective. Hee hee.'%K%P
Kagura must have a strong will to be able to laugh\nabout it like that. I'd have to say that Shuri's\nshyness was a more natural reaction.%K%P
'Even if someone sees them, it's only for\na few seconds. It's not like people stare\nat them for ages...'%K%P
'Uh, not like how you're staring at them now.'%K%P
'Whoa! Sorry! Cover yourself up, okay?'%K%P
'Heh heh.'%K%P
'Kagura.'%K%P
'Maybe this'll help me understand how Shuri feels.'%K%P
I suppose being exposed to my gaze\ngave her a taste of what shyness was like.%K%P
'Yeah, this is starting to get kinda awkward. \nI'll probably start blushing in a moment...'%K%P
During her private shoot I had only seen brief\nflashes of skin. But now Kagura had nowhere\nto hide.%K%P
'Your face is red.'%K%P
'I'm starting to feel hot...'%K%P
'Is this how Shuri feels all the time? \nI had no idea...'%K%P
'Come on, that's enough. You can stop now.'%K%P
'No, just a little more. \nJust until Shuri gets back.'%K%P
For the next few minutes Kagura continued to\nshow off her underwear to me.%K%P
'Kagura! Your moves are getting clumsy.'%K%P
'Oh, sorry.'%K%P

It probably wouldn't last long,\nand she'd be back to her usual self in no time.%K%P
'You're going to throw me off my game, too.'%K%P
Following Kagura's constrained dancing\ncouldn't be easy.%K%P
But that wasn't going to stop Shuri.%K%P
She doggedly carried on despite\nher partner's hesitation.%K%P
'Whoa!'%K%P
Kagura suddenly lost her balance\nand collided with Shuri.%K%P
'Aaah!'%K%P
The other girl toppled and fell like a domino.%K%P
'Shuri!'%K%P
I instinctively sprang forward.%K%P
I thought I might be able to catch her,\nbut ended up collapsing along with her.%K%P
*smoosh*%K%P
My hand came into contact with something soft. \nTrying to work out what it was, I moved my hand\naround some more.%K%P

A gentle cry rang out in response to my touch.%K%P

Well, it hurt like I'd hit it.\nI'd scraped my elbows, too.%K%P
'Now hold still a moment. \nI'll get us out of this.'%K%P
Shuri tried to get up from the floor. \nBut she hadn't noticed her sari was underneath me,\nso it didn't go very well.%K%P

Despite her protests, she really had started\nto grind against some of my own sensitive areas.%K%P

Kagura had hold of the video\ncamera and was filming us.%K%P

As a result, the end product stimulated\nthe imagination even more than expected.%K%P

Still feeling a little frustrated,\nI uploaded the finished video.%K%P
This one might just be on par with\nthe one from Kagura's shoot.%K%P
'Whoa, comments already?! \nThe video's made quite the impression.'%K%P
I'd told Shuri when the upload was done,\nand it looked like she'd seen the new flood\nof adoration.%K%P

[Shuri's such a tease!]%K%P
